Reviews.Title: great DIY alarm system
Reviews.Author: Joe Stoner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for self install in my 1973 Ford.  Installation was simple, although I have had previous experience with automotive wiring.  The instructions are sparse, so it might be harder for the inexperienced.The range of the remote is very good.  I was pleased with the features this alarm has.  I've added power door locks to the car and have 2 auxiliary  control functions left in-case I want to add a trunk pop or remote start.you will need to purchase some relays to get all of the functionality of this alarm working.I also added an audio trigger from Directed Electronics to this alarm by splicing it into the shock sensor wires - just match the colors and it works perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Nice alarm but remote is too fat
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The alarm system is great and the siren is super loud. But the remotes are fat and cheap looking. Plus they break very easily. I installed this for a customer but personally I only you viper systems in my car.5 stars for the alarm3 stars for the remote

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: leog237
Reviews.Content: I was very happy to recive my new alarm i installed it and worked really good and have had no trouble with it.

Reviews.Title: Astra 777 Mini Alarm
Reviews.Author: ewhite
Reviews.Content: Received this product very fast and installation instructions were included. I installed it on a dodge charger and had no issues at all with the system. Customer was happy.
